Bibliographic Retrieval from Bibliographic Input; The Hypothesis and Construction of a Test .A Ruecking, Frederick H. Jr. A study of problems associated with bibliographic retrieval using unverified input data supplied by requesters.. A code derived from compression of title and author information to four, four-character abbreviations each was used for retrieval tests on an IBM 1401 computer.. Retrieval accuracy was 98.67%.. .X 19	1	851 24	1	851 64	1	851 119	1	851 175	1	851 228	2	851 245	1	851 281	2	851 287	1	851 318	1	851 321	2	851 324	1	851 329	1	851 331	1	851 348	1	851 374	1	851 408	1	851 416	2	851 442	2	851 450	2	851 495	2	851 511	2	851 524	2	851 554	1	851 563	4	851 565	1	851 567	1	851 584	1	851 601	1	851 654	1	851 717	1	851 781	1	851 783	1	851 834	1	851 835	10	851 836	3	851 848	1	851 849	2	851 850	2	851 851	19	851 852	1	851 856	1	851 857	1	851 858	1	851 859	1	851 860	1	851 861	1	851 862	6	851 863	1	851 867	1	851 868	1	851 869	1	851 875	1	851 907	1	851 922	1	851 925	1	851 981	2	851 982	1	851 984	1	851 1011	1	851 1012	1	851 1013	2	851 1035	1	851 1042	1	851 1051	1	851 1053	1	851 1194	2	851 1196	3	851 1197	6	851 1199	2	851 1415	1	851 1445	1	851 1445	1	851
